languages.text: "Не слушай... Он почти сломлен и хочет поторговаться". {n}Похоже, в голове у Лорд-инквизитора возникли те же чужие мысли, что и в вашей. Но решительный голос его перекрывает даже титанический рев Ярма, пожинающего мощь К'тан.{/n} "Ослабь его еще немного, и процесс сковывания будет завершен. Во имя Императора, {name}!"

"Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
languages.original_text: "Не слушай... Он почти сломлен и хочет поторговаться". {n}Похоже, в голове у Лорд-инквизитора возникли те же чужие мысли, что и в вашей. Но решительный голос его перекрывает даже титанический рев Ярма, пожинающего мощь К'тан.{/n} "Ослабь его еще немного, и процесс сковывания будет завершен. Во имя Императора, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: "Don't listen... He is almost crushed, so he now tries to haggle." {n}It seems like the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in the Lord Inquisitor's head. But his resolute voice overpowers even the titanic roar of the Yoke, reaping C'Tan's power.{/n} "Weaken him just a bit more, and the binding process will be completed. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Don't listen... He is almost crushed, so he now tries to haggle." {n}It seems like the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in the Lord Inquisitor's head. But his resolute voice overpowers even the titanic roar of the Yoke, reaping C'Tan's power.{/n} "Weaken him just a bit more, and the binding process will be completed. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Don't listen... He is almost crushed, so he now tries to haggle." {n}It seems like the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in the Lord Inquisitor's head. But his resolute voice overpowers even the unbearable roar of the Yoke, reaping the C'Tan's power.{/n} "Weaken him just a bit more and the binding process will be completed. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Don't listen... He is almost crushed, so he now tries to haggle." {n}It seems like the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in the Lord Inquisitor's head. But his resolute voice overpowers even the unbearable roar of the Yoke, reaping the C'Tan's power.{/n} "Weaken him just a bit more and the binding process will be completed. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Ne l'écoutez pas... Il tente simplement de négocier parce qu'il sait qu'il sera bientôt vaincu. » {n}Apparemment, les mêmes pensées intrusives se sont insinuées dans l'esprit de Calcazar, mais sa voix déterminée couvre même le rugissement insupportable du Joug qui arrache le pouvoir de l'Écharde.{/n} « Affaiblissez-le encore un peu et le processus de sujétion sera achevé. Au nom de l'Empereur, {name} ! »
languages.original_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: « Ne l'écoutez pas... Il tente simplement de négocier parce qu'il sait qu'il sera bientôt vaincu. » {n}Apparemment, les mêmes pensées intrusives se sont insinuées dans l'esprit de Calcazar, mais sa voix déterminée couvre même le rugissement insupportable du Joug qui arrache le pouvoir de l'Écharde.{/n} « Affaiblissez-le encore un peu et le processus de sujétion sera achevé. Au nom de l'Empereur, {name} ! »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «No le escuche... Está prácticamente destrozado; su única opción ahora es negociar». {n}Parece que Calcazar ha oído los mismos pensamientos intrusivos en su cabeza, pero su voz firme se antepone incluso al rugido insufrible del Yugo mientras absorbe el poder del fragmento.{/n} «Debilítelo un poco más y pronto el proceso de vinculación estará completo. ¡Por el Emperador, {name}!».
languages.original_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: «No le escuche... Está prácticamente destrozado; su única opción ahora es negociar». {n}Parece que el Lord Inquisidor ha oído los mismos pensamientos intrusivos en su cabeza, pero su voz firme se antepone incluso al rugido insufrible del Yugo mientras absorbe el poder del C'Tan.{/n} «Debilítelo un poco más y el proceso de vinculación estará completo. ¡Por el Emperador, {name}!».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “不要听他的声音……它已经要被摧垮了，所以才打算讨价还价。”{n}看起来，充满侵略性的思想也同样传入了卡尔卡扎的脑海中。然而，他坚定的意志盖过了圣枷汹涌的咆哮，依然在不断削弱星神碎片的力量。{/n}“只要再削弱他一点点，我们就能把它抓住了！以帝皇之名，{name}！”
languages.original_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: “不要听他的声音……他已经要被摧垮了，所以才打算讨价还价。”{n}看起来，充满侵略性的思想也同样传入了审判长的脑海中。然而，审判长坚定的意志盖过了圣枷汹涌的咆哮，正在不断削弱星神的力量。{/n}“只要再削弱他一点点，我们就能把他抓住了！以帝皇之名，{name}！”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Hört nicht hin .... Es ist fast am Ende, also will es verhandeln." {n}Wie es scheint, haben sich dieselben Intrusionen auch in Calcazars Verstand eingeschlichen. Allerdings übertönt seine resolute Stimme selbst das laute Brüllen des Jochs, das dem Fragment noch immer seine Macht entzieht.{/n} "Schwächt es noch etwas mehr, dann ist der Bindungsprozess abgeschlossen. Im Namen des Imperators, {name}!"
languages.original_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: "Hört nicht auf ihn ... Er ist fast vernichtet, daher versucht er nun zu feilschen." {n}In den Kopf des Großinquisitors sind offenbar dieselben Gedanken eingedrungen. Doch seine resolute Stimme überwältigt selbst das unerträgliche Brüllen des Jochs, welches die Macht des C'tan erntet.{/n} "Schwächt ihn nur noch ein wenig mehr, dann ist der Bindungsprozess abgeschlossen. Im Namen des Imperators, {name}!"
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「耳を傾けてはならない…危うく破壊されかけたがゆえに、今度は交渉を持ちかけているのだ」{n}カルカサルの心にも、同様に押し付けがましい思考が浮かんでいるらしい。しかし彼の毅然とした声はヨークの耐え難い轟音さえも凌駕し、ク＝タンの力を刈り取る。{/n}「もっと弱らせれば、拘束は完了する。皇帝の名のもとに、{name}！」
languages.original_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"

traits.locale_text: 「耳を傾けてはならない…危うく破壊されかけたがゆえに、今度は交渉を持ちかけているのだ」{n}カルカサルの心にも、同様に押し付けがましい思考が浮かんでいるらしい。しかし彼の毅然とした声はヨークの耐え難い轟音さえも凌駕し、ク＝タンの力を刈り取る。{/n}「もっと弱らせれば、拘束は完了する。皇帝の名のもとに、{name}！」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Onu dinleme... Bozulmak üzere, seninle pazarlığa girişiyor." {n}Aynı uygunsuz düşünceler Calcazar'ın da aklına gelmiş. Yine de kararlı ses tonu, Parça'nın gücünü çekmeye devam eden Boyunduruk'un vahşi kükremesini bastırıyor.{/n} "Biraz daha gücünü al, yakında bağlanma işlemi tamamlanacak. İmparator adına {name}!"
languages.original_text: "Do not listen... It is almost broken, so now it is trying to negotiate." {n}It seems that the same intrusive thoughts have appeared in Calcazar's mind as well. Nevertheless, his resolute voice overpowers even the violent roar of the Yoke, still in the process of reaping the Shard's power.{/n} "Weaken it more, and soon enough the binding process will be complete. In the name of the Emperor, {name}!"
